title: sdmax2021
author: sdmax2021
content: Hi guys, I'm a very new one to crypto, I found a project and i asked from few people about that, so they guide me to ask it on here ..  So the project name is "DECODE" . One of my best friend told me to invest just 10$ here and i will receive a 200$ worth of tokens.. So then i checked the project details... i will put those details below. anyway they have mentioned that the price hs been risen 182% within 6 weeks . So i'm thinking that to invest more than 10$ for this... IS IT  A GOOD DECITION? and other thing is , they have mentioned about a exchange.... Do you know about that? (I have put the link below of the exchange)SO MY MAIN QUESTION IS , IF YOU WERE ME WHAT DO YOU DO ?----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------FREE 2,500,000 DECODE PROMOTION! Go to decodeex.com/promo!To coincide with the DigitX celebrations, the Decode Coin team will xxxx xxx 2.5 Million Decode. All crypto wallets are eligible! Just create an Account and the FIRST 1,000 ACCOUNTS to Buy 10 USDT worth of DECODE for each wave will be airdropped 200 DECODE! Check Decode Coin Price at decodeex.com/price ! 182% in 6 weeks! TO GET FREE DECODE COIN:STEP 1: Scan the QR Code or go to decodeex.com/promoSTEP 2: Register and VERIFY EMAILSTEP 3: Sign-In (ico.decodeex.com) and Input your BEP-20/ERC-20 Wallet Address STEP 4: Submit KYC RequirementsSTEP 5: BUY 10 USDT worth of $DECODE: decodeex.com/swapHOLD AND WAIT FOR THE RELEASE OF YOUR TOKEN!6:00 PM (AEST), 3:00 AM (PHT), 3:00 PM (EST) WAVE 1: Starts 4th October 2022WAVE 2: Starts 11th October 2022WAVE 3: Starts 18th October 2022WAVE 4: Starts 25th October 2022  Your 200 $DECODE will be airdropped within the duration of the wave (within one week). Only those wallets that hold at least 10 USDT worth of DECODE on the day of the distribution will be awarded the coins. BONUS: There is also a SURPRISE AIRDROP happening during the promotion, so make sure that you have at least 10 USDT worth of DECODE COINS within the day. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------This is the message i received from my friend ..

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMSTEP 4: Submit KYC RequirementsNo, thank youQuote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMYour 200 $DECODE will be airdropped within the duration of the wave (within one week). Only those wallets that hold at least 10 USDT worth of DECODE on the day of the distribution will be awarded the coins. BONUS: There is also a SURPRISE AIRDROP happening during the promotion, so make sure that you have at least 10 USDT worth of DECODE COINS within the day. This kind of strategy is shouting a dump after the distribution of the airdrop token.  The increase of 182% is generated by the project itself by increasing the price of the token after some time of pre-selling and is not generated by the market itself.  Besides, I can't find the people behind this project so I am not sure whether the project is legit or created to scam people.

comments.author: Ayers
comments.body: it sounds like an illusion but for only 10$ i think you can also try it because this is not a big amount if you are not lucky to lose, i think they do not affect you. spending 10 bucks for a session is well worth it but if you don't believe it, it's best to skip them. as for me, these types of investments i tend to ignore, i don't want to waste time looking at themQuote from: serjent05 on October 08, 2022, 10:26:05 PM Besides, I can't find the people behind this project so I am not sure whether the project is legit or created to scam people. projects like this often have anonymous teams, they don't dare to reveal their identities, not only is it dangerous for them, but if this project dies, they won't be able to do another project. this is common with junk projects, shitcoins

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMHi guys, I'm a very new one to crypto, I found a project and i asked from few people about that, so they guide me to ask it on here ..  So the project name is "DECODE" . One of my best friend told me to invest just 10$ here and i will receive a 200$ worth of tokens.. So then i checked the project details... i will put those details below. anyway they have mentioned that the price hs been risen 182% within 6 weeks . So i'm thinking that to invest more than 10$ for this... IS IT  A GOOD DECITION? and other thing is , they have mentioned about a exchange.... Do you know about that? (I have put the link below of the exchange)Avoid the token and save your money. They are just pump and dump tokens, by the time you receive the so-called airdrop, the coin price will have dumped to a worthless level.There is no guarantee the tokens you will receive will be worth $200, they could be worth $0.0002

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: don't deliver your documents on this site, they don't need to ask for KYC because they don't even have a license and they aren't regulated so why are they asking people to do KYC? this doesn't make sense, if you KYC on this site you will be running the risk of seeing your documents being used to commit crimes because these guys on this site can sell these documents to criminals, so don't KYC on this site. about the project itself, don't waste time on it, this kind of thing never ends well, just spend your money buying bitcoin which is much saferQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 08, 2022, 11:59:55 PMQuote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMHi guys, I'm a very new one to crypto, I found a project and i asked from few people about that, so they guide me to ask it on here ..  So the project name is "DECODE" . One of my best friend told me to invest just 10$ here and i will receive a 200$ worth of tokens.. So then i checked the project details... i will put those details below. anyway they have mentioned that the price hs been risen 182% within 6 weeks . So i'm thinking that to invest more than 10$ for this... IS IT  A GOOD DECITION? and other thing is , they have mentioned about a exchange.... Do you know about that? (I have put the link below of the exchange)Avoid the token and save your money. They are just pump and dump tokens, by the time you receive the so-called airdrop, the coin price will have dumped to a worthless level.There is no guarantee the tokens you will receive will be worth $200, they could be worth $0.0002and to make the situation worse, they are tokens dealt in few exchanges and shady exchanges where the person at the time of withdrawal also has headaches because the withdrawal is pending for days and the person contacts the support that takes days to solve the problem

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: @sdmax2021, I just visited their website and it looks like the website is under maintenance. But if i look at the way they offer their tokens that you described above, it seems that this project is not a good and promising project. They claim to be a Cryptocurrency and NFT exchange, even I myself have never heard of the name Decode for the crypto and NFT market, LOL. I advise you to ignore this token offer to keep your money safe.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: lobo13hf on October 08, 2022, 11:27:01 PMQuote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMOne of my best friend told me to invest just 10$ here and i will receive a 200$ worth of tokens.. To good to be true, it's actually scam. It seems like your friend may try to mislead you. Scammer will be stealing your Identity and he will use it for the criminal purpose. You shall not follow your friend's order to follow him. He wants you to join in the shitty scam airdrop like that. Never try to invest your money in that shit. You will be just wasting your money to get nothing. The worst thing when you give your identity to the scammersMaybe his friend is not aware that this is most likely a scam, but without a doubt this merits at least to investigate, as why one person which you consider a friend is recommending you to invest in something which is so obvious that it is a scam, now things will be bad enough if you were just asked to invest some money in something that there is no guarantee they will pay you back, but they also want people to go through KYC, which means those people can steal your identity, and once that data is online you can never recover it.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: You will invest 10$ and you will receive 200$ worth of tokens? Lol don't fall on it mate and don't believe on what your friend saying because obviously such way of convincing investors is literally a scam scheme.. Fyi I've been here on this industry for 5 years now and most of the victims of scam project always fell on such way of promises.  So I'm really sure that you will receive a shitcoin afterwards , trust me.

comments.author: Ammaa
comments.body: If i were you , i will invest if it is just a 10$ & see what happens next.. because the begining  of most projects seems like scam, but some prjects are not scam project. if you invest those projects t the begining , then you will earn more profit after few months or years.. Thats just my opinion

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: It's up to you if you want to invest in that project but as for me, I don't want to invest in a project that requires me to do KYC. If it's really a good project, it will get on the list of major exchanges and that's when we can buy it and make it an investment. Too many projects like that ended up being a scam, but I'm not saying that the project will be a scam in the end. I just remind you to be more careful with such offers so that you can invest in the right project.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Offering a thing that's too good to be true like that is always being done by scammers. Scammers may aim for your money. Never trust your friend but trust yourself. Your money and your choice. It's not your money and your friend's choice. Think about that. Making money is not so easy like that. You need a very hard effort to make it happen. Don't buy such token. Your friend may affiliate with scammers as well. People have been warned you but if you are still joining on it and lose your money and that's your fault.

comments.author: BF-Fi
comments.body: If it is just 10$ and if they have already implimented several things  i will just invest for it.... But be careful when you submit your kYC for any kind of project/Site

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: in all respects, this is a scam.Only the first thousand people for $ 10.And the developers put 10k dollars in their pocket and in return they give tokens to investors)You do not need to have a lot of knowledge to understand that they are trying to deceive you.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Unfortunately, this seems to be fishy in the first place.And then KYC? yeah I know we really hate what's going on right now in crypto space with the whole mandate about KYC but his project? Nah, I'll pass with the KYC requirement.And then you have to buy at at least $10 worth of USDT? again, I'll pass because this is really a trap for traders, unless you are part of a pump and dump group and target this token to create hype.

comments.body: Quote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMI'm a very new one to crypto, I found a project and i asked from few people about that, so they guide me to ask it on here ..  So the project name is "DECODE" . One of my best friend told me to invest just 10$ here and i will receive a 200$ worth of tokens.. So then i checked the project details... i will put those details below. Too good to be true, one f the characteristics of scam projects or shit projects that will be failed. Only giving promises.Quote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMSO MY MAIN QUESTION IS , IF YOU WERE ME WHAT DO YOU DO ?Get into other cryptocurrencies that are worthier and have more potential, for example, Bitcoin, BNB, or ETH, which have been trusted exactly for both short-term and long-term investments. Quote from: sdmax2021 on October 08, 2022, 06:46:22 PMSTEP 4: Submit KYC RequirementsKYC?No.. Better to leave, too risky
